name: Puzzle Brain 1010
description:
Fill in the blank space with the given block! It's a simple game, but the more you clear stages, the more challenging you can see.

How to Play:
• Drag the blocks to craft a straight line and destroy them.
• No color matching is required in this block craft game
• Fill all the grids with cubes and play smartly.
• Take a pause to think your move
